body_html: We're planning to write some tutorials on RNN conversion. This approach does still include an unsupported unstack. I think you'd probably want to make a function that generates either a training graph that uses a dynamic rnn and a inference graph that does a 1 time step static_rnn. Then your tflite Invoke() call feeds one sequence item at a time.

body: We're planning to write some tutorials on RNN conversion. This approach does still include an unsupported unstack.  I think you'd probably want to make a function that generates either a training graph that uses a dynamic rnn and a inference graph that does a 1 time step static_rnn. Then your tflite Invoke() call feeds one sequence item at a time.
